name: Stardex
headline: Automate recruiting tasks
description: Wharf is a recruiting copilot that automates repetitive research tasks in recruiting using AI.

founders.name: Sanket Chauhan, Founder
founders.description: Prev: digital product strategy @ McKinsey. Studied Electrical engineering @ USC and spent some time working on a dental analytics startup

founders.name: Pranav Badami, Founder
founders.description: Full-stack software engineer that likes to build fast.

## Built with automation in mind
Stardex leverages AI to help you execute searches faster and build great relationships
#### Instant search 
#### Instant search 
State of the art search engine to instantly search through all your candidate data, including tags, work experience, notes and more.
#### Auto tagging fields
#### Auto tagging fields
Our AI automatically tags profiles when they're added from LinkedIn. You can also create custom fields (e.g., ‚ÄúStartup Experience‚Äù), and our AI will auto-tag profiles accordingly.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/oTeaunxQ2LdTONNPyzOPrQou4c.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/oTeaunxQ2LdTONNPyzOPrQou4c.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/oTeaunxQ2LdTONNPyzOPrQou4c.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/oTeaunxQ2LdTONNPyzOPrQou4c.png)
#### Find and send emails
#### Find and send emails
You can find emails directly from the Chrome Extension or the dashboard. Once an email is found, you can send an email as well!
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Bcp4nuqJ8MTynDGlwspIKenrqoI.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Bcp4nuqJ8MTynDGlwspIKenrqoI.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Bcp4nuqJ8MTynDGlwspIKenrqoI.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Bcp4nuqJ8MTynDGlwspIKenrqoI.png)
#### One click sourcing
#### One click sourcing
Source and reach out to candidates quickly right from LinkedIn with our best-in-class Chrome extension

## Stardex: The Future of Recruitment Automation

Founded in 2021 and based in San Francisco, Stardex is shaking up the recruiting industry by automating the repetitive research tasks that often bog down hiring professionals. Originally launched under the name Wharf, this innovative company is a proud participant of the Y Combinator S21 batch, benefitting from one of the most prestigious startup accelerators out there.

### Mission and Products

Stardex is all about automating recruiting tasks, leveraging artificial intelligence to streamline workflows and improve productivity. Their primary offering is a recruitment copilot that focuses on automating mundane research tasks, enabling recruiters to focus on what really matters‚Äîbuilding relationships and closing critical hires.

Their platform features a user-friendly interface with powerful tools like:
- **Instant Search**: A modern search engine that allows recruiters to quickly sift through candidate data including tags, experience, and notes.
- **Auto-Tagging**: As candidates are added from sources like LinkedIn, Stardex's AI automatically tags profiles, ensuring that the information remains organized and accessible.
- **Email Integration**: Recruiters can find and send emails right from the platform or via a Chrome extension, simplifying candidate outreach.
- **One-Click Sourcing**: Quickly reach out to potential candidates directly through LinkedIn.

### Team and Growth

With a compact yet dedicated team of just two employees, Stardex maximizes its human resources to achieve big results. Their group partner is Nan, further ensuring that the company is well-positioned for growth and expansion.

### What's Next?

Stardex is committed to evolving with the needs of modern recruiters, continually integrating new features and refining their automation tools. Whether you're a recruiting firm looking to enhance your processes or a company wanting to streamline your hiring efforts, Stardex promises to be an ally in navigating the ever-changing landscape of talent acquisition.

If you‚Äôre curious to see how they can help you, consider [booking a demo](https://www.stardex.ai/#book-demo) today. With its dedication to productivity and innovation, Stardex is poised to change the recruitment game one automated task at a time.

### Explore More
Check out their website at [stardex.ai](https://www.stardex.ai) for more information, and see how they can revolutionize your recruiting efforts.
